name: Grow Chicken Grow!
description:
This is "Grow Chicken Grow"!

You are a tiny chicken and your goal is to grow. You must eat 30 worms to become an adult chicken and win the game.

Use WASD to move. Avoid the foxes, they enjoy eating little chickens like you.

This is my project for the "Low Effort Game Jam 9", made with Java and LibGDX. Assets were drawn in PowerPoint, sounds were made with BeepBox
